data.text:
Home | LRS Waste Management Services

Driven By Service.

Dedicated To Sustainability.

Find available services by entering your zip code below

Ready to Get Started?

The LRS Difference

See what separates our service from the rest.

Right-sized pricing

With custom plans and competitive rates, you get the best blend of price and service.

Local Support

Your questions are always answered quickly by our friendly, knowledgeable team.

On Time & Efficient

Our timely and thorough service lets you enjoy true peace of mind.

All The Extras

From roll-off dumpsters to portable restrooms, we’ve got your additional needs covered.

Our Story

As one of America’s leading waste diversion, recycling, and portable services providers, we’re proud to be pioneering a new path forward in sustainability and service.

Our Core Values

Safety

Protecting the well-being of our employees and the communities is essential. That’s why we’ve taken the lead in building a lasting culture of safety and awareness.

Social Impact

From volunteering and fundraising to our mindful hiring practices and outreach programs, we’re proudly working to help enrich the neighborhoods we serve and live in.

Sustainability

We’re proud to be reducing consumption, diverting material away from landfills, and consistently working to improve our planet’s long-term viability.

Help & Support

For more information, tap into our recycling resources, see our FAQs, or contact us anytime!

Awards & Accolades

What our customers are saying:

“I’ve used LRS for almost 10 years and have been very satisfied with their service and friendly employees.”

“Their truck drivers are friendly and go above & beyond! They even helped me carry a heavy mattress from the garage to the truck. I highly recommend LRS."

“Reliable service, reasonable costs, and when I needed to talk to an agent, they were very friendly and knowledgeable.”

“They’re reliable, respectful of our property, and always meet our needs Thank you!”

“Their service is priced fairly and a good value. LRS drivers are always reliable and courteous when I interact with them.”
